name: Buttons with component properties and Material Design icons
description:
Updated on May 30, 2022:

  • Buttons now support the new component properties feature. Swap icons directly at an instance level, so there's no need to select and override individual layers.

Updated on March 19, 2021:

  • Buttons are now interactive components
  • Changed colours to respect accessibility standards


A simple boilerplate button library using component properties. variants, auto-layout and Material Design Icons.


The Material Design Icons also use variants so you can easily switch between filled, rounded, sharp, outline and two-tone icon styles. Thanks, @alexeykisets for such a useful library.


Button variants:

  • 5 sizes (extra small, small, medium, large and extra-large)
  • 4 types (primary, secondary, outlined and link)
  • 3 states (default, hover & focus and disabled)
  • Icon (left, right or not icon)


If you have any feedback, or you think something is missing please get in touch.
